mapper.delete: DELETE FROM SYS_USER_ORG WHERE orgId=#{orgId} and isCharge=1
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_user_org SET orgId=#{orgId,jdbcType=NUMERIC} , userId=#{userId,jdbcType=NUMERIC} , isPrimary=#{isPrimary,jdbcType=NUMERIC} , isCharge=#{isCharge,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, isDept= #{isDept,jdbcType=NUMERIC} WHERE userOrgId=#{userOrgId}
UPDATE sys_user_org SET isPrimary=0 WHERE userId=#{userId}
mapper.select: select a.userOrgId,a.orgId,a.userId,a.isPrimary,a.isCharge,b.fullname as userName from SYS_USER_ORG a join SYS_USER b on a.userId=b.userId where a.orgId=#{orgId} and a.isCharge=1

select a.userOrgId,a.orgId,a.userId,a.isPrimary,a.isCharge,b.orgName,a.isDept,b.orgsupid as orgSupId from SYS_USER_ORG a join SYS_ORG b on a.orgid=b.orgid where a.userid=#{userId} order by userOrgId desc
select a.userOrgId,a.orgId,a.userId,a.isPrimary,a.isCharge,b.orgName,a.isDept from SYS_USER_ORG a join SYS_ORG b on a.orgid=b.orgid where a.userid=#{userId} order by userOrgId desc
select * from SYS_USER_ORG where userId=#{userId} and isCharge=1

SELECT a.userId,a.fullname userName,a.account,b.userOrgId,c.orgName,b.isPrimary,isCharge,b.isDept FROM sys_user a join sys_user_org b on a.userId=b.userId join sys_org c on b.orgId=c.orgId
AND c.path LIKE '%${path}%' AND a.fullname LIKE '%${fullname}%' AND a.account LIKE '%${account}%'
order by ${orderField} ${orderSeq}
order by c.orgType,c.orgId
